sentences.en: "Holy Mother of God!" Marco crossed himself.
sentences.cn: “圣母啊！”马尔科画着十字说道。

sentences.en: A holy person is required to read the Holy Bible.
At the festival, candles are blessed and sprinkled with holy water.
sentences.cn: 在节日里，要对蜡烛祝圣，并洒以圣水。

sentences.en: Every year they put a play on at Saint Holy Cross Church.
sentences.cn: 他们每年在圣十字教堂上演一出剧目。

sentences.en: He reads the Holy Bible every night.
He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
sentences.cn: 他将以圣灵和火为你们施洗.

sentences.en: I don't understand a modern day account of the Holy Trinity.
sentences.cn: 我对现代的基督教三位一体的解释不理解.

sentences.en: Please put off your shoes before entering this holy building.
sentences.cn: 在进入这所神圣的殿堂之前,请把鞋脱掉.

sentences.en: Remember the Sabbath day, to keep it holy.
St Paul speaks of the body as the "temple of the Holy Spirit".
sentences.cn: 圣保罗把身体描述为“圣神的宫殿”。

sentences.en: The invading army desecrated this holy place when they camped here.
sentences.cn: 侵略军在这块圣地上扎营就是对这块圣地的亵渎.

sentences.en: The priest sprinkled the baby with holy water.
sentences.cn: 牧师往那孩子身上洒圣水.

sentences.en: To desecrate a holy spring is considered profanity.
sentences.cn: 圣泉俗用被认为是亵渎神灵的行为。
